Jung Seunghwan

Korean: 정승환

Group (2022-present):
Gomak Boys

Introduction

Jung Seung Hwan is a South Korean singer and songwriter under Antenna Music. Before debuting in 2016, Jung Seung Hwan joined K-pop Star 4 where he finished as a runner-up.
